page.title: 04CHANGES IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: We had to go and look around the village because the map we were using is 30 years old, and there are some things that aren't on the map, and the fields have changed. The fields are much bigger because the hedges have been taken out. There are a lot more houses and bungalows in the village. An old chapel has been converted into a house. A footpath has been changed to come out into a street of new houses. It was difficult to decide what had been growing in the fields, but we remembered what colour the fields had been. We have two pubs and a cricket pitch, and only two shops, one of which is the Post Office as well. We only have one bus that goes through the village and some of us use it to come to school.
